title: ping issues

embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

body:
ping chicago servers (104.160.131.1 ) 
consistent 30-40 ping feelsgoodman
go into game 200-300 ping #ritostrikesagain

http://imgur.com/a/glJoS

sent from East Coast using TWC

Happens sometimes in CSGO as well, i have no explanation, using ethernet and restarted modem but no solootion

replies.body: I have the same problem I am usually at 35 ping and when in game I am consitently over 150 and spiking to 300+. Makes it impossible to play

> [{quoted}](name=Draven Always,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=E7o0uriY,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-01-27T01:04:42.229+0000)
>
> I have the same problem I am usually at 35 ping and when in game I am at 130 makes it impossible to play

130 impossible to play?  nah, that is easy.  try the 220 that ive been getting every day.  i dream of 130.

im talking about lowest ping
my ping hovers around there but spikes up to 300+
